title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; chat, generate, embeddings, model management with 3-line setup.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting any chain call Ollama models via ChatOllama / Ollama LLM wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (models, chats, uploads, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, model management, Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s sidebar chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI with REPL, syntax highlighting, conversation history.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, delete, embeddings, streaming.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama’s REST API with GenServer and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama; chat, generate, embeddings, model management, built-in DI extensions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama generators & chatters in production RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-made Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Postgres, Qdrant, nginx for full RAG.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI fork that can switch between Ollama and GPT4All backends.

title: ollama-rag-stack
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + LangChain + Chroma + Streamlit in one repo.

title: ollama-napi
summary: Node-API native addon for Ollama providing high-performance token streaming in Node.js.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; async client, SSE streaming, model ops, CLI example.
